title: Can I sue my ex boyfriend for using me for money
question: We date for 6 years and I gave him $6000 to get two different car in diferent years I pay his debts and child support I gave him $3000 every month for 6 years he promess me we will get marry once he move back to CA becuz he was for three years in Atlanta GA taking care his son he live in CA for two years on 2009 and left to Atlanta on 2010 and Comeback to CA to live with me on 2013 but he only stay with me for 1 month and half he left telling me he doesn't love me but at the same time I find a document by accident that he was taking the same amount he asked when he was living with me from an other women wish he live with her now i gave him over $200.000 in 6 years he push me to give him money and treat me that if I don't give him his money he will drop school and end up in legal problem
question_tags: Child support,Bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Car Accidents,Fraud,Police interrogation,Statute of limitations of child support,Lawsuits and disputes
answers:
He will probably say that the money was a gift. It is possible that what he did was a crime. You could try contacting the local police. It is also possible that you have been the victim of fraud and may be able to file a civil lawsuit. Collecting any money from this scam artist may prove to be difficult.
Start with the police. If that does not get you anywhere, go see a local attorney.
you need to sit down and talk to a local attorney to see if a statute of limitations problem exists. It may also be appropriate to file a police report. Talk to a local attorney about your options.
